description: This file is a JavaScript module implementing a client for the NewsAPI, providing functions to fetch top headlines and search results, with environment-based configuration, error handling, and support for proxy or direct API modes.

methods.name: getNewsApiConfig
methods.description: Retrieves configuration for NewsAPI from environment variables, including base URL and API key.

methods.name: buildQuery
methods.description: Constructs URL query string from parameters.

methods.name: mapApiError
methods.description: Maps API response errors to user-friendly messages.

methods.name: isNetworkOrCORSError
methods.description: Detects network or CORS errors based on error object.

methods.name: toUserFacingError
methods.description: Converts errors into user-friendly error objects for UI display.

methods.name: doFetch
methods.description: Performs fetch request to NewsAPI with mode-aware URL and headers, handles errors.

methods.name: getTopHeadlines
methods.description: Fetches top headlines with optional filters like country, category, page size, and page number.

methods.name: searchEverything
methods.description: Searches for news articles with query, sorting, language, and pagination options.
